info.name: Quest
info.summary: Gamify your productivity with Nextcloud Tasks
info.description:
Transform your task management into an engaging game! Quest adds gamification elements to Nextcloud Tasks, helping you overcome procrastination through:
* **XP & Levels** - Earn experience points and level up by completing tasks * **Achievements** - Unlock badges for milestones and special accomplishments * **Streaks** - Build and maintain daily completion streaks * **Progress Tracking** - Visualize your productivity journey
Perfect for individuals and teams who want to make task completion more engaging and rewarding.
info.author: Quest Team
